thread.title: Tunisia: Parliament Passes Supplementary Budget Law for 2015
thread.title_full: Tunisia: Parliament Passes Supplementary Budget Law for 2015

title: Tunisia: Parliament Passes Supplementary Budget Law for 2015
text:
Nigeria: Tribal, Religious Sentiments Fuel Boko Haram Crisis - Former Army Chief 
Tunis — The House of People's Representatives (HPR), on Wednesday, passed the supplementary Finance Law for 2015 with 126 votes for, 24 against and 3 abstentions. 
MPs accelerated the adoption of articles of that law after the plenary session was adjourned twice because of disputes around article 8 on boosting employment. 
The HPR, Wednesday, began the discussion of the supplementary budget law for 2015 article by article after the Prime Minister presented the government statement on Tuesday and the debate launched by MPs on that bill. Tunisia
